statements: SELECT project_name, certification_status FROM leed_certification_progress;
SELECT certification_status, certification_date FROM leed_certification_progress WHERE certification_status='In Progress';
SELECT * FROM leed_certification_progress WHERE project_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT project_name, certification_status, certification_date FROM leed_certification_progress WHERE certification_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, documentation_path FROM leed_certification_progress WHERE documentation_path IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM leed_certification_progress WHERE project_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
SELECT project_name, certification_status FROM leed_certification_progress WHERE certification_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT project_id, project_name, certification_date FROM leed_certification_progress WHERE certification_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM leed_certification_progress WHERE certification_status = 'Approved' ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, documentation_path FROM leed_certification_progress WHERE documentation_path IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM project;
SELECT project_name, location FROM project WHERE status = 'ongoing';
SELECT project_id, project_name, location, status FROM project WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT project_id, COUNT(*) as num_documents FROM documentation GROUP BY project_id HAVING num_documents > 5;
SELECT doc_id, project_id, document_type, document_path, uploaded_date FROM documentation WHERE uploaded_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY uploaded_date ASC;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM project WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT project_name, location, status FROM project WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT * FROM documentation WHERE document_type = 'Technical Specification' ORDER BY uploaded_date DESC;
SELECT project.project_name, documentation.document_type FROM project JOIN documentation ON project.project_id = documentation.project_id WHERE project.status = 'Completed';
SELECT project.project_id, documentation.doc_id FROM project LEFT JOIN documentation ON project.project_id = documentation.project_id WHERE documentation.doc_id IS NULL;
SELECT id, name, status FROM Project;
SELECT certification_agent, project_id, certification_date FROM Certification WHERE certification_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_id, document_type, document_description FROM Documentation WHERE project_id = 3;
SELECT id, name, status FROM Project ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT certification_agent, project_id, certification_date FROM Certification WHERE project_id = 5;
SELECT name, status FROM Project WHERE certification_level='Advanced' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Documentation WHERE project_id=2 AND document_type='Manual' ORDER BY document_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, certification_date, certification_agent FROM Certification ORDER BY certification_date ASC;
SELECT name, certification_level FROM Project WHERE status='Active' AND certification_level='Basic' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT project_id, document_type, document_description FROM Documentation WHERE LENGTH(document_description) > 100 ORDER BY project_id ASC, document_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM green_building_projects;
SELECT project_name, location FROM green_building_projects ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT project_id, certification_status FROM green_building_projects WHERE certification_status = 'Pending';
SELECT project_name, location, certification_status FROM green_building_projects WHERE location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT p.project_name, c.criteria_name FROM green_building_projects p JOIN project_criteria_mapping m ON p.project_id = m.project_id JOIN certification_criteria c ON m.criteria_id = c.criteria_id;
SELECT * FROM green_building_projects;
SELECT project_name, location FROM green_building_projects ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT project_name, certification_status FROM green_building_projects WHERE certification_status = 'Certified';

SELECT pb.project_name, cc.criteria_name FROM green_building_projects AS pb JOIN project_criteria_mapping AS pcm ON pb.project_id = pcm.project_id JOIN certification_criteria AS cc ON pcm.criteria_id = cc.criteria_id ORDER BY pb.project_name;
SELECT pb.project_name, pcm.completion_status FROM green_building_projects AS pb JOIN project_criteria_mapping AS pcm ON pb.project_id = pcm.project_id WHERE pcm.completion_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, certification_level FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, certification_level FROM projects ORDER BY certification_level DESC;
SELECT project_name, certification_level FROM projects WHERE project_id IN (1, 2, 3);

SELECT projects.project_name, certification_agencies.agency_name FROM projects JOIN project_certifications ON projects.project_id = project_certifications.project_id JOIN certification_agencies ON project_certifications.agency_id = certification_agencies.agency_id;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, certification_level FROM projects WHERE certification_level = 'Gold';
SELECT project_name, project_id FROM projects ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM project_documents WHERE document_type = 'Report' AND project_id = 3;

SELECT project_certifications.project_id, projects.project_name, certification_agencies.agency_name FROM project_certifications JOIN projects ON project_certifications.project_id = projects.project_id JOIN certification_agencies ON project_certifications.agency_id = certification_agencies.agency_id;
